Description: Textile fragment; torn strip of undyed linen cloth, medium quality; areas rotted away are edged in black resin(?) (contact with it has caused the deterioration). Also a hole due to wear. Side edges torn, ends cut. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.27 ends per 10mm and weft c.12 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: Probably the same cloth as BM 6548 Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1993]
